dt: {bc}any of a family (Acipenseridae) of usually large elongate anadromous or freshwater bony fishes which are widely distributed in the north temperate zone and whose roe is made into caviar

et: Middle English, from Anglo-French {it}estourgeoun{/it}, of Germanic origin; akin to Old English {it}styria{/it} sturgeon
shortdef: any of a family (Acipenseridae) of usually large elongate anadromous or freshwater bony fishes which are widely distributed in the north temperate zone and whose roe is made into caviar
